entities.description: Identifies a specific variable being measured in the survey.
The type of the variable, which in this case is numeric.
The range of values that indicate missing data for the variable.
The number of occurrences of each value before applying survey weights.
The percentage of the total for each specific value.
The number of stolen motor vehicles as reported in the survey.

relationships.description: Specifies the type of the survey variable.
Links the survey variable to the range of values that indicate missing data.
Indicates the number of occurrences of each value before weighting.
Indicates the percentage of the total each specific value represents.
Indicates that the survey variable measures the number of stolen motor vehicles.
